channel.title: Headquarters for DCS World
channel.description: A mission generator for Eagle Dynamics' DCS World flight simulator.

item.title: 8 October 2019
item.description: Hi everyone! As many of you have noticed, development of HQ4DCS has stalled since late August. Due to some recent circumstances in my life, I had to stop working on my open source projects. Don't worry, everything is back to normal now, and development of both planned and new features will resume soon. As a matter of respect for my backers, I declined recurring Paypal donations for the months during which I did not update the project. My untold goal was to make sure open beta 2 would be available before the DCS: Viper early access, and I was pretty confident I could be faster than Eagle Dynamics, well... I was wrong :) Thanks again for your support, and sorry again about this delay.

item.title: 21 June 2019
item.description: HQ4DCS Open Beta 2 will be open source! You read that right: the next version of HQ4DCS will be open source and hosted on GitHub...

item.title: 25 May 2019
item.description: It's been some time without news and an update is long overdue...
